languages.text: {n}Перед вами хрупкая ветвь Лавандулум Террум — редчайший экземпляр флоры родом из Сегментум Соляр. Унизанное крохотными соцветиями оттенка лилового неба, оно бережно запечатано в колбу с минеральными удобрениями, модифицированными Магосами Биологис для поддержания его многолетней жизни.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Перед вами хрупкая ветвь Лавандулум Террум — редчайший экземпляр флоры родом из Сегментум Солар. Унизанное крохотными соцветиями оттенка лилового неба, оно бережно запечатано в колбу с миниральными удобрениями, модифицированными магос-биологис для поддержания его многолетнеей жизни.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Before you is a fragile branch of Lavandulum Quaddis — a most rare specimen native to the world of Quaddis in the Calixis Sector. Covered in tiny blooms the colour of a purple sky, the plant has been carefully sealed inside a dome along with mineral fertiliser modified by the Magos Biologis, which will sustain it for many years.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Before you is a fragile branch of Lavandulum Terrum — a most rare specimen native to the Segmentum Solar. Covered in tiny blooms the colour of a purple sky, the plant was carefully sealed inside a dome with mineral fertiliser modified by the Magos Biologis to sustain it for many years.{/n}

Covered in tiny blooms the colour of a purple sky, the plant has been carefully sealed inside a dome along with mineral fertiliser modified by the Magos Biologis, which will sustain it for many years.{/n}

languages.text: {n}摆在你面前的是一株卡迪斯薰衣草，是原产自卡利西斯星区卡迪斯星的珍稀植物。如同紫色天空般绚丽的娇小花朵被小心翼翼地密封在水晶罩中。水晶罩中堆积着生物贤者改造过的矿物肥料，足以维持它常年盛开。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Before you is a fragile branch of Lavandulum Quaddis — a most rare specimen native to the world of Quaddis in the Calixis Sector. Covered in tiny blooms the colour of a purple sky, the plant has been carefully sealed inside a dome along with mineral fertiliser modified by the Magos Biologis, which will sustain it for many years.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}摆在你面前的是一株特瑞姆薰衣草，是原产自太阳星域的珍稀植物。如同紫色天空般绚丽的娇小花朵被小心翼翼地密封在水晶罩中，生物贤者改造过的矿物肥料足以维持它常年盛开。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vor dir befindet sich ein zarter Zweig Lavandulum Quaddis — eine höchst seltene Spezies, die auf der Welt Quaddis im Calixis-Sektor beheimatet ist. Die Pflanze ist mit winzigen Blüten in der Farbe eines violetten Himmels bedeckt. Sie wurde sorgfältig in einer Kuppel versiegelt, zusammen mit mineralischem Dünger. Der Dünger wurde von den Magos Biologis modifiziert und kann die Pflanze viele Jahre lang nähren.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Before you is a fragile branch of Lavandulum Quaddis — a most rare specimen native to the world of Quaddis in the Calixis Sector. Covered in tiny blooms the colour of a purple sky, the plant has been carefully sealed inside a dome along with mineral fertiliser modified by the Magos Biologis, which will sustain it for many years.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vor dir befindet sich ein zarter Zweig Lavandulum terrum — eine höchst seltene Spezies, die im Segmentum Solar beheimatet ist. Die Pflanze ist mit winzigen Blüten in der Farbe eines violetten Himmels bedeckt. Sie wurde sorgfältig in einer Kuppel versiegelt, zusammen mit mineralischem Dünger. Der Dünger wurde von den Magos Biologis modifiziert und kann die Pflanze viele Jahre lang nähren.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous avez devant vous une branche fragile de lavandulum quaddis, un spécimen très rare originaire du monde de Quaddis dans le secteur Calixis. Couverte de minuscules fleurs de la couleur d'un ciel violet, la plante a été soigneusement scellée dans un dôme avec de l'engrais minéral modifié par le Magos Biologis, ce qui lui permettra de survivre des années.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Before you is a fragile branch of Lavandulum Quaddis — a most rare specimen native to the world of Quaddis in the Calixis Sector. Covered in tiny blooms the colour of a purple sky, the plant has been carefully sealed inside a dome along with mineral fertiliser modified by the Magos Biologis, which will sustain it for many years.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous avez devant vous une branche fragile de lavandulum terrum, un spécimen très rare originaire de Segmentum Solar. Couverte de minuscules fleurs de la couleur d'un ciel violet, la plante a été soigneusement scellée dans un dôme avec de l'engrais minéral modifié par le Magos Biologis, qui lui permettra de survivre des années.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ante ti hay una frágil rama de Lavandulum Quaddis, un espécimen rarísimo nativo del planeta Quaddis, en el sector Calixis. Cubierta de pequeñas flores del color de un cielo púrpura, la planta ha sido cuidadosamente sellada dentro de una urna junto con fertilizante mineral modificado por los Magos Biologis, que la mantendrá viva durante muchos años.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Before you is a fragile branch of Lavandulum Quaddis — a most rare specimen native to the world of Quaddis in the Calixis Sector. Covered in tiny blooms the colour of a purple sky, the plant has been carefully sealed inside a dome along with mineral fertiliser modified by the Magos Biologis, which will sustain it for many years.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ante ti hay una frágil rama de Lavandulum Quaddis, un espécimen rarísimo nativo del planeta Quaddis, en el sector Calixis. Cubierta de pequeñas flores del color de un cielo púrpura, la planta ha sido cuidadosamente sellada dentro de una urna junto con fertilizante mineral modificado por los Magos Biologis, que la mantendrá viva durante muchos años.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたの前にあるのは、もろいラヴァンドゥルム・クアディスの枝だ…これはキャリクシス星域のクアディス生まれのもっとも希少な種である。紫の空の色をした小さな花をまとうこの植物は、生物学賢人が改良した無機質肥料と一緒に、ドームの内側に注意深く封印されていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Before you is a fragile branch of Lavandulum Quaddis — a most rare specimen native to the world of Quaddis in the Calixis Sector. Covered in tiny blooms the colour of a purple sky, the plant has been carefully sealed inside a dome along with mineral fertiliser modified by the Magos Biologis, which will sustain it for many years.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの前にあるのは、もろいラヴァンドゥルム・クアディスの枝だ…これはキャリクシス星域のクアディス生まれのもっとも希少な種である。紫の空の色をした小さな花をまとうこの植物は、生物学賢人が改良した無機質肥料と一緒に、ドームの内側に注意深く封印されていた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Karşında narin bir Lavandulum Quaddis dalı duruyor. Calixis Sektörü'nün Quaddis gezegeninden, çok nadide bir tür. Alaca karanlığı andıran minik çiçeklerle bezeli bu bitkinin yanında Magos Biologislerce yapılmış, onu uzun yıllar beslemeye yetecek mineralli gübre de bulunuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Before you is a fragile branch of Lavandulum Quaddis — a most rare specimen native to the world of Quaddis in the Calixis Sector. Covered in tiny blooms the colour of a purple sky, the plant has been carefully sealed inside a dome along with mineral fertiliser modified by the Magos Biologis, which will sustain it for many years.{/n}
